CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL( Education_Record__r.Hotel_Requested__c , "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Education_Record__r.Travel_Type_Requested__c ,"Flight"), ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Travel_Type_Requested__c,"Train"), ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Car_Request__c,"Car Rental Requested"), ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Car_Request__c,"Taxi/Public Transportation"))
CustomField.label: Travel Required
